description:
This canyon is described in limited detail in Canyons Near Sydney by Rick Jamieson. Help the Australian canyoning community by contributing track notes to ropewiki.com

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

  • David Noble : Northern Blue Mountains Canyoning - 24 - 25 March 2012. Day 2 is Twilight Canyon.
  • Fat Canyoners : Hartleys Mistake and Twilight (or the goanna genocide). Nov 2012.

Background

David Noble says: named by a Catholic Bushwalking Club party (probably early in 1980). The party started down the canyon at twilight, having spent most of the day climbing up Looking Glass Canyon as their approach.
name: Twilight
